edu.jhu.coe.syntax
Class BerkeleyCompatibleFragment

java.lang.Object
  edu.jhu.coe.syntax.BerkeleyCompatibleFragment

public class BerkeleyCompatibleFragment
extends Object

An easy and (hopefully) efficient way of uniquely representing fragments, of arbitrary depth, that is compatible with the shared-structure rule format.

Author:
Frank Ferraro
